parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The throttle sticking issue in 3rd gear can cause the motorcycle to continue accelerating unexpectedly, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential harm to the rider and others on the road.
symptoms: The throttle fails to close while in 3rd gear
causing the motorcycle to maintain speed or accelerate even when the throttle is rolled off
the throttle sticks to the floor
the motorcycle continues to accelerate when the rider attempts to slow down.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The speedometer inaccuracy can lead to citations from law enforcement and potential accidents, as riders may be unaware of their actual speed.
symptoms: The speedometer reading is 10 mph off
the motorcycle's speed is incorrectly displayed
the speedometer is inconsistent with actual speed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sticking throttle and engine stalling can cause loss of control, accidents, and near misses, especially when downshifting to slow down or approaching intersections.
symptoms: the motorcycle slows down or loses power
the motorcycle is difficult to control

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Stator Failure in Kawasaki Vulcan 900 Motorcycles
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The premature wear of the stator (charging unit) in Kawasaki Vulcan 900 motorcycles can cause the engine to short out, leading to a loss of control of the motorcycle, which can result in accidents.
symptoms: and premature wear of the stator.
